alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:21PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln, Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 821 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Winchester to 8 miles southwest of Turtle Flambeau Flowage to 6 miles west of Phillips. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winchester around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lac Du Flambeau, Rice Creek Natural Area, Squirrel Lake, Border Lakes Natural Area, Boulder Junction, Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area and Tripoli. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
